term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - dynamic range of an analyser
term.title: dynamic range

item.text: The ratio between the maximum usable indication and the minimum usable indication (detection limit). A distinction may be made between the linear dynamic range, where the response is directly proportional to concentration, and the dynamic range where the response may be non-linear, especially at higher concentrations.
